_comment: Can have a total of 15 name and value pairs in any catogoery ending with 'Overveiw'. More rules can be found here https://discordjs.guide/popular-topics/embeds.html#notes

Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.name: **Discord Chat Rules**
Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.value: These rules apply to the Discord server.

Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 1
Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.value: Please do not advertise. (Do not give links to other servers.)

Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 2
Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.value: Do not ping Admin or Staff. (If you have a problem, cerate a ticket.)

Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 3
Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.value: Do not spam. (We do not want the same thing over and over again.)

Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 5
Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.value: Do not ask for admin or a higher rank. (Joining then asking for a high rank or admin is anoying and gets you banned.)

Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 6
Discord Chat Rules Overveiw.value: You must be over 13. (Discords terms of services rule: "By using or accessing the Discord application (the “App”) or the website located at https://discord.com/ (the "Site"), which are collectively referred to as the “Service,” you agree (i) that you are 13 years of age and the minimum age of digital consent in your country." You can find all of the rules of discord at https://discord.com/terms.)

FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.name: **FiveM Server Rules**
FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.value: These rules apply to the FiveM server.

FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 1
FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.value: You must be trained before you patrol by yourself. Create a ticket and we will be hapy to train you.

FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 2
FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.value: Using our cad system is required during gameplay. (Unless down.)

FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 3
FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.value: Do not abuse your power. (Do not use your power to gain an advantage over other players.)

FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 4
FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.value: Do not break roleplay. (Do not do anything that would not happen in real life. Unless an exception is mady by actiave staff.)

FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 5
FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.value: Cars and Clothing are for a specific department. (Please use items specific to your rank.)

FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.name: Rule 6
FiveM Server Rules Overveiw.value: Do not use any mods. (This includes trainers, cheats, and any other mods.)
